source.guidance: **Relative file paths** describe the location of a file or directory in relation to the user's current working directory. **Absolute file paths** represent a location starting from the system's root directory.
source.instructions: Click the button below to submit your response.
source.name: File Paths
source.text: <<<Relative file paths>>> describe the location of a file or directory in relation to the user's current working directory. <<<Absolute file paths>>> represent a location starting from the system's root directory.
